content: MFT-FOX VI M Bracket Versatile wall bracket for installing rainscreen façade substructures ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Brackets- - - ### FEATURES:Features Labor saving – optimized bracket design and innovative fastening solutions help to lower your total cost of installation Easier installation – optimized helping hand and clearer markings to simplify bracket fastening and rail alignment Multiple fastening options – can be installed using suitable anchors, screws or direct fastening (DX) Pre-assembled bracket – arrives on-site ready to fasten to the wall or slab Engineering support available – contact your local Hilti team for project-specific advice on optimizing the ventilated façade substructure Applications Fastening rainscreen façade substructure to concrete, masonry, metal studs and wood Mounting façade substructures on the primary structure (helping hand bracket) Installing vertical support rails Suitable for all façade cladding ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: EN AW-6063 T66 Insulation material: Polypropylene Thickness Insulation Material: 0.24 in Technical Data | Material composition | EN AW-6063 T66 | Insulation material | Polypropylene | Thickness Insulation Material | 0.24 in | Width | 53 mm | Height | 80 mm ### ITEMS- 2305984 -
